BlackNightmare:

Every word that Malice was saying was a painful strike in =
her heart.

"It isn't your fault that you convinced me to follow you when I=
 knew that this would happen sooner or later since you started to remember"=
she answered bittery while she tried to hold back the tears"And why you sai=
d to find something worthy than you? have you forgotten who was I? who stil=
l am I? I guess you aren't, 'cause  you're holding me... You're afraid what=
 can I do next.. And that I don't want to be around you, you said? Are you =
trying to convince yourself  that I don't want your company? that I'm let y=
ou go at your wish 'cause I don't love you... or do you want convince me th=
at I don't love you and my feeling isn't true?   "
  ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
  From: robert riley 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursda=
y, April 07, 2005 12:32 AM
  Subject: Re: Wolf Tears


  Malice::

  He app=
roached her and firmly held her shoulders, so she could not get away or las=
h out easily.

  "What we have to talk about is going to hurt.  Hurt you, a=
nd hurt me too.  It's not going to be easy, but it is necessary.  It's for =
your betterment.  I'm sorry, but I cannot love both you and Wolfblade as I =
have tried.  It simply will not work.  It was wrong of me to force you into=
 this arrangement, and I'm sorry for that.  I have thought long and hard ov=
er this, and I have come to the conclusion I love Wolfblade more, enough to=
 spend the rest of my life with her.  I still love you, Blacknightmare, but=
 not romantically.  You helped save me from Unicron, for that I am eternall=
y grateful.  Please, do not be angry or upset, don't leave in pain.  Stay w=
ith us, you're a close friend, it would kill me from the inside out if you =
left and got injured or killed.  You have the chance to move on now, to fin=
d someone more worthy than me for your romantic desires.  I've killed more =
than I care to remember, for many millions of years.  You don't want to be =
around me all the time anyway.  You have a new life, go and live it, explor=
e every possibility, I wish not to hinder you.  I love you still, my deares=
t friend, and savior.  Please, do not be angry at me or Wolfblade for this,=
 it is all my doing."
